Smart thermostats.Description: Smart thermostats can monitor and control energy consumption in homes, helping to optimize energy usage and reduce waste.
Smart thermostats can integrate with home automation systems, allowing users to control their thermostats remotely and create personalized schedules.
Smart thermostats are part of the Internet of Things ecosystem, enabling connectivity and communication with other smart devices in a home.
Smart thermostats contribute to energy efficiency by automatically adjusting temperature settings based on occupancy and user preferences, leading to energy savings.
